3: (Puts down the mechanoid head) None of these guards are properly communicating with each other... but taking down anyone of them and the whole area's alerted.
Probably has something to do with the dual alarm system I found out. It's impossible to not trigger it at this stage.
Operating in the enemy's den means that there'll only be more and more guards I have to take down up ahead.
I don't think it'll take long before the alerted guards have me surrounded.
This defense strategy is like a pool of quicksand... Going to drag me to my death without me noticing.
Unless... I can slip inside without taking down any one of them.
(Raises her bow) The comms interference is indeed getting stronger the closer I am to the building...
Bianca is here... which means I have to beware of the Purifying Force as well.
Hold on... None of these guards can stand a chance against someone like her.
If I stay close behind her, they'll only go after her instead of me if the alarm goes off.
It's not honorable, sure, but in order to save my people...
I need to hurry. I'm still very far away from where Commandant's chip was located.
(Draws her bow) You're in my way! Move!
It's been a while... You're getting stronger again, Bianca.
